comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Why "Hayword the Skipper"?  His name obviously was Hayward.

comment.author: 52276725@N03
comment._content: Highly decorated and a Vice Admiral as well. Has his wings too. A hero!

comment.author: 42986213@N02
comment._content: This is Vice Admiral John T. "Chick" Hayward. He was a WWII Aviator and a participant in Project Camel of the Manhattan Project where he worked on non-nuclear components of the Fat Man bomb and it's drop testing. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_T._Hayward
